column.Name: WorkflowType
column.lookupquery: SELECT WorkflowTemplateID, TemplateName FROM pWorkflowTemplate WHERE Active = 1 AND Body = 0 ORDER BY TemplateName

column.Name: DivisionID
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomID, Custom FROM iCustom1 WHERE Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomSort

column.Name: StyleType
column.lookupquery: SELECT StyleTypeID, StyleTypeDescription FROM pStyleType ORDER BY StyleTypeDescription

column.Name: StyleCategory
column.lookupquery: SELECT StyleCategoryId, StyleCategory FROM pStyleCategory Where Active = 1 ORDER BY StyleCategory

column.Name: SizeClass
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, Custom AS CustomName FROM pSizeClass Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: SizeRange
column.lookupquery: SELECT SizeRangeCode, SizeRangeCode AS SizeRangeCodeName FROM pSizeRange Where Active = 1 ORDER BY SizeRangeCode

column.Name: IntroSeasonYearID
column.lookupquery: SELECT SeasonYearID, SeasonYear FROM vwx_SeasonYear_SEL

column.Name: WashType
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom5 ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: CustomField3
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom AS CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom8 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: Designer
column.lookupquery: SELECT Firstname +' ' +Lastname as name, Firstname +' ' + Lastname as fullname from users Where TradePartner = 0 AND Title='Designer' order by firstname

column.Name: TechnicalDesigner
column.lookupquery: SELECT Firstname +' ' +Lastname as name, Firstname +' ' + Lastname as fullname from users Where TradePartner = 0 AND Title='Tech Designer' order by firstname

column.Name: ProductionManager
column.lookupquery: SELECT Firstname +' ' +Lastname as name, Firstname +' ' + Lastname as fullname from users Where TradePartner = 0 AND Title='Sourcing' order by firstname

column.Name: StyleThemeID
column.lookupquery: SELECT '00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000' as StyleThemeID,'' as ThemeName,NULL as sort UNION SELECT StyleThemeID, ThemeName,sort FROM pStyleTheme WHERE Active=1 order by sort

column.Name: Active
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM pActive

column.Name: CustomField5
column.lookupquery: SELECT SourceID, Source FROM pSource ORDER BY SourceID

column.Name: SubCategoryId
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomID, Custom FROM pSubCategory WHERE Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomSort, Custom

column.Name: CustomField6
column.lookupquery: SELECT SourceID, Source FROM pSource ORDER BY SourceID

column.Name: SeasonYearID
column.lookupquery: SELECT SeasonYearID, SeasonYear FROM vwx_SeasonYear_SEL WHERE ACTIVE = 1 ORDER BY Sort, Year DESC

column.Name: StyleSet
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, CustomKey FROM xCustom9 ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: OwnerGroup
column.lookupquery: SELECT GroupId, GroupName from UGroup ORDER BY GroupName

column.Name: CustomField12
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom AS CustomKey, Custom FROM iCustom29 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: CustomField13
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom AS CustomKey, Custom FROM iCustom30 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey
